mapper.select: select no, title, writer, typeqna, reg_date from(select no, title, writer, 'typeqna', reg_date from tb_qna union select no, title, id, 'typestudy', reg_date from tb_study union select quiz_no, title, nickname, 'typequiz', reg_date from tb_quiz_board union select no, content, writer, 'typeqnacm', reg_date from tb_qna_comment union select quiz_no, content, nickname, 'typequizcm', reg_date from tb_quiz_comment union select no, content, id, 'typestudycm', reg_date from tb_study_comment) b where writer = #{writer} order by reg_date desc limit #{begin}, 5

select count(*) from(select no, title, writer, 'typeqna', reg_date from tb_qna union select no, title, id, 'typestudy', reg_date from tb_study union select quiz_no, title, nickname, 'typequiz', reg_date from tb_quiz_board union select no, content, writer, 'typeqnacm', reg_date from tb_qna_comment union select quiz_no, content, nickname, 'typequizcm', reg_date from tb_quiz_comment union select no, content, id, 'typestudycm', reg_date from tb_study_comment) b where writer = #{writer}

select count(*) from(select no, title, writer from tb_qna union select no, title, id from tb_study union select quiz_no, title, nickname from tb_quiz_board union select no, title, writer from tb_notice) b

select d.* from (select id, point, nickname, IF(point=@_last_point,@curRank:=@curRank,@curRank:=@_sequence) AS rank, @_sequence:=@_sequence+1,@_last_point:=point from tb_user p, (SELECT @curRank := 1, @_sequence:=1, @_last_point:=0) r order by point desc) d

select no, title, content, writer, typeqna, reg_date, comCnt from(select no, title, content, writer, 'typeqna', reg_date, (select count(*) from tb_qna_comment where no = q.no) as comCnt from tb_qna q union select no, title, content, id, 'typestudy', reg_date, (select count(*) from tb_study_comment where no = s.no) as comCnt from tb_study s union select quiz_no, title, content, nickname, 'typequiz', reg_date, (select count(*) from tb_quiz_comment where quiz_no = qz.quiz_no) as comCnt from tb_quiz_board qz union select no, title, content, writer, 'typenotice', reg_date, (select count(*) from tb_notice_comment where no = n.no) as comCnt from tb_notice n) b where title like concat('%', #{searchContent}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{searchContent}, '%') order by reg_date desc limit #{begin}, 10

select count(*) from(select no, title, content, writer, 'typeqna', reg_date, (select count(*) from tb_qna_comment where no = q.no) as comCnt from tb_qna q union select no, title, content, id, 'typestudy', reg_date, (select count(*) from tb_study_comment where no = s.no) as comCnt from tb_study s union select quiz_no, title, content, nickname, 'typequiz', reg_date, (select count(*) from tb_quiz_comment where quiz_no = qz.quiz_no) as comCnt from tb_quiz_board qz union select no, title, content, writer, 'typenotice', reg_date, (select count(*) from tb_notice_comment where no = n.no) as comCnt from tb_notice n) b where title like concat('%', #{searchContent}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{searchContent}, '%')
